comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: This is likely the presentation of the Chalmers Award, precursor to the Most Valuable Player award. It included the presentation of a Chalmers auto to the winner. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Major_League_Baseball_Most_Valuable...

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Confirming Artolog's hypothesis: NYT of Oct 4, 1914 says that Collins and Evers had been declared "most useful" to their teams in their respective leagues. Two cars were donated by the Chalmers Automobile Company. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9E0DEED9153FE233A...
